Thanks for using "Files Protection". We hope you are enjoying the application! Please keep it updated so you are always got our latest and greatest improvements.
Noticeable changes in this update includes:
- Add the option that allows user to enable/disable the TouchID/FaceID.
- Support the hidden the thumbnail.
- Add the long press gesture on the file/folder that allows user to access more options.
- Fix an issue which caused of crashed app on some users when they tried to view a photo.
- Improve performance.

Thanks for using "Files Protection". We hope you are enjoying the application! Please keep it updated so you are always got our latest and greatest improvements.
Noticeable changes in this update includes:
- Update for iOS13
- Support to unzip file
- Support to download files and save them into Downloads folder (UNSUPPORT downloading the content type of VIDEO/AUDIO)
- Add new History tab to manage the bookmark & download history
- Improve the movie player
- Support to preview the photo/video on the landscape mode
*** Support the rotation on iPAD device
